#### Clean Work Environment

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
```

#### Load Packages

```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

#### Load Data

```{r}
#| message: false
data_load <- load(file = '~/projects/Group25_Project/data/02_dat_clean.RDS')
```

```{r}
view(data_load)
```

## Number of Responses

```{r}
data_counts <- data_load |>
               count(cohort, sample_ID) |>
               left_join(data_load |> 
                         distinct(sample_ID, 
                                  .keep_all = TRUE) |>
               select(sample_ID, KIR_blocking), 
                      by = "sample_ID")

print(data_counts)
```

## BoxPlots

```{r}

ggplot(data_counts, aes(x=cohort, y=n, fill=KIR_blocking)) + 
    geom_boxplot()
```
